writer.name: 克里斯·阿特金斯 Chris Atkins

director.name: 克里斯·阿特金斯 Chris Atkins

introduction: Starsuckers is a documentary showing an attempt to expose the shams and deceit involved in creating a pernicious celebrity culture. Directed by Chris Atkins, the BAFTA-nominated director of the documentary Taking Liberties, it shows the Starsuckers production team planting a variety of celebrity-related stories in the UK media, such as a claim that Avril Lavigne had been seen asleep in a nightclub. A variety of tabloid newspapers accepted the stories without corroboration or evidence.It will launch as part of the British Film Institute's 53rd Film Festival.
